name: Long Distance (itch) (Vikezor, RagingThor)
description:
made by vikezor and raging thor for mini jame gam #10

the 900s are rough 900p versions for somewhat smaller screens

using exp dialog system by dave the dev and courier prime font by Alan Dague-Green

in a very rough state; not finished at all. the actual interesting parts aren't even in

featuring:

  • unrealistic switchboard
  • no failure state
  • crashes
  • Sound Effect
  • Dialog System
  • Mouse Control
  • Graphics
  • Rich Text
